Canon EOS 200D

Visual storytelling is made easy with the Canon EOS 200D – a feature-packed digital SLR camera that combines familiar touchscreen controls with superb image quality & offers you access to Canon’s legendary range of interchangeable lenses.

You can use the EOS 200D how you want to; it gives you the freedom to shoot cinematic Full HD movies & simply share videos and images online by easily transferring them to your smart device.

    Features

  • Next-generation 24.2 megapixel CMOS Sensor
  • World’s lightest DSLR
  • Bright optical viewfinder
  • Vari-angle touchscreen
  • World’s fastest Live View Autofocus system
  • Wirelessly transfer images to smartphone or tablet
  • Bluetooth, NFC, and Wi-Fi connectivity
  • Control the camera from your smart device
  • Full 1080p HD movie recording
  • Dual Pixel CMOS AF focusing system
  • Time-lapse movie function
  • Access to Canon lenses & accessories
  • DIGIC 7 processor for fast handling images quickly
